channel.title: New Sheriff scout bug
channel.description:
#### What happened? This happened two times in one game, confirmed by two different Sheriffs. Our BD person was visited by Unseen according to Sheriff's scout in the night that person was jailed. I played Prince so I know for sure who was jailed and two different Sheriffs claimed that the person I jailed was visited by Unseen. That happened at N3 and N4.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Jailed person can't be visited so Sheriff's scout should never tell that jailed person is visited.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments: This bug costed us the game cause I executed Sheriff thinking he was Scorned or evil.

Scout will no longer tell you if a player was converted, and will instead tell you if the Unseen visited targeted player.

tell you if unseen visited, not targeted or attempted to visit. If the visit was prevented, it should not trigger scout.
